attributes.name: descriptors
attributes.description: Descriptors that may be used to characterize the esophageal stricture

values.name: patulous
values.description: Esophageal stricture is characterized as patulous

values.name: distended
values.description: Esophageal stricture is characterized as distended

values.name: fluid-filled
values.description: Esophageal stricture is characterized as fluid-filled

attributes.name: presence_of_stricture
attributes.description: Indicates whether the esophageal stricture is present or absent

attributes.name: location_of_stricture
attributes.description: The location of the esophageal stricture

values.name: proximal esophagus
values.description: Esophageal stricture is located in the proximal esophagus

values.name: middle esophagus
values.description: Esophageal stricture is located in the middle esophagus

values.name: distal esophagus
values.description: Esophageal stricture is located in the distal esophagus

values.name: gastroesophageal junction
values.description: Esophageal stricture is located at the gastroesophageal junction
